item.title: Style_changelog
item.description: 元祖github-styleからの変更履歴 アイコンを日替わりのidenticonに設定 (6 March 2022) Publication への固定リンクをメニューに追加 (6 March 2022) ライトモー

item.title: Publications
item.description: Preparation/Submitted Matsunobu, T., A. Zarboo, C. Barthlott, and C. Keil (2022) Impact of combined microphysical uncertainties on convective clouds and precipitation in ICON-D2-EPS forecasts during different synoptic control, Weather Clim. Dynam., https://doi.org/10.5194/wcd-2022-17, accepted. Matsunobu, T., J. F. Quinting, C. M. Grams, and M. Matsueda (2022) Impact of East-Asian weather patterns on regional extreme precipitation events in Japan. In preparation. Published Barthlott, C., A.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Add your privacy policy here and set draft: false to publish it. Otherwise, delete this file if you don’t need it.
